== Thiruvananthapuram (M Corp. + OG) (Part) (803312) ==

Thiruvananthapuram (M Corp. + OG) (Part) is a town in the [[Neyyattinkara]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 29.05 sq. km. and harbouring 4756 households with total population of 25736 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuarm]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 12967 and female population is 12769. Scheduled Caste population is 986 and Scheduled Tribes population is 45. Census Location Code of the town is 803312<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is ''.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 10 km. Railway station is at Thiruvananthapuram at a distance of 0 km.

There is fire fighting service in the town.
